description.en: USD ZEE is a stablecoin backed by actual assets, including USD. One USD ZEE equals one underlying unit of the currency backing it, e.g., the U.S. Dollar, and is backed 100% by actual assets in the USD ZEE platform’s reserve account. Being anchored or “USD ZEE” to real world currency, USD ZEE provides protection from the volatility of cryptocurrencies.
